review_title: Good overall experience, though it remains necessary to improve the management.
pros: Meaningful projects, especially the programs for beneficiaries in France. Good insurance and training opportunities. Convenient work/life balance. Interesting time off policies (5 weeks paid holidays + 22 "RTT"s per year (for "Reduction du Temps de Travail", additional days off)).
cons: Some of the high-level managers, though mostly competent on the technical side of their jobs, are disrespectful of the employees. This creates important tensions in several departments and leads to departures of experienced staff, attached to the original MDM culture. Quite some mobility but limited promotion opportunities. Low salaries, especially for qualified staff.
